20110107020722.000|20110107020725.000|CC1|BE ABLE TO REDUCE COSTS IN

20110107020738.000|20110107020742.000|CC1|FIRST OF ALL, THERE TENDS TO

20110107020814.000|20110107020815.000|CC1|>> Lehrer: THOSE ARE REAL

20110107020815.000|20110107020819.000|CC1|>> THOSE ARE CHANGES IN THE

20110107020829.000|20110107020832.000|CC1|THAT BUDGETS FOR A FIVE YEAR    
20110107020832.000|20110107020833.000|CC1|PERIOD.                         
20110107020833.000|20110107020835.000|CC1|WE HAVE THE AMOUNTS WE LOOK AT  
20110107020835.000|20110107020837.000|CC1|FOR THAT ENTIRE FIVE YEAR       
20110107020837.000|20110107020839.000|CC1|PERIOD, AND THOSE AMOUNTS ARE   
20110107020839.000|20110107020840.000|CC1|GOING TO BE LOWER THAN WE       
20110107020840.000|20110107020842.000|CC1|EXPECTED LAST YEAR N. THIS      
20110107020842.000|20110107020844.000|CC1|SENSE, IT'S A CUT, BUT IN       
20110107020844.000|20110107020846.000|CC1|TERMS OF ACTUAL DOLLARS, AS I   
20110107020846.000|20110107020848.000|CC1|INDICATED, WE'RE GOING TO SEE

20110107020857.000|20110107020859.000|CC1|ACCOUNTS AND THAT KIND OF

20110107020859.000|20110107020900.000|CC1|>> Lehrer: AND YOU'RE           
20110107020900.000|20110107020901.000|CC1|MAINTAINING THAT BY SWITCHING   
20110107020901.000|20110107020902.000|CC1|MONEY YOU'RE NOT GOING TO       
20110107020902.000|20110107020904.000|CC1|SPEND AND SPEND IT IN THOSE

20110107020904.000|20110107020906.000|CC1|>> WELL, WE'RE FINDING THAT     
20110107020906.000|20110107020908.000|CC1|MONEY BY REDUCING OVERHEAD,     
20110107020908.000|20110107020910.000|CC1|WHAT PEOPLE REFER TO AS WASTE   
20110107020910.000|20110107020911.000|CC1|OR FAT OR WHATEVER YOU WANT TO  
20110107020911.000|20110107020914.000|CC1|CALL IT, BUT THE SERVICES, THE  
20110107020914.000|20110107020916.000|CC1|MILITARY SERVICES HAVE DONE AN  
20110107020916.000|20110107020917.000|CC1|INCREDIBLE JOB OF GOING INTO    
20110107020917.000|20110107020918.000|CC1|THEIR JOBS AND GOING INTO THE   
20110107020918.000|20110107020921.000|CC1|WAY THEY DO BUSINESS, AND       
20110107020921.000|20110107020923.000|CC1|IDENTIFYING CONSOLIDATIONS,     
20110107020923.000|20110107020925.000|CC1|ELIMINATIONS AND VARIOUS OTHER  
20110107020925.000|20110107020926.000|CC1|THINGS TO CUT THEIR OVERHEAD,   
20110107020926.000|20110107020929.000|CC1|AND THEY WERE INCENTIVIZED TO   
20110107020929.000|20110107020931.000|CC1|DO THAT, BECAUSE THEY WERE      
20110107020931.000|20110107020932.000|CC1|ASSURE WHAD THEY SAVEED IN      
20110107020932.000|20110107020934.000|CC1|OVERHEAD THEY COULD INVEST IN   
20110107020934.000|20110107020935.000|CC1|MILITARY CAPABILITIES.

20110107024440.000|20110107024442.000|CC1|KIDS TO SCHOOL HELP THEM GET    
20110107024442.000|20110107024445.000|CC1|OVER THIS WINTER.               
20110107024445.000|20110107024446.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND IRONICALLY-AMID
20110107024446.000|20110107024448.000|CC1|ALL THIS FLOODING, KAMAL SAYS   
20110107024448.000|20110107024450.000|CC1|PAKISTAN FACES A WATER SHORTAGE 
20110107024450.000|20110107024505.000|CC1|AND THEE LONG TERM-THANKS TO    
20110107024505.000|20110107024509.000|CC1| S                              
20110107024509.000|20110107024511.000|CC1|>> Lehrer: FRED'S REPORT WAS A  
20110107024511.000|20110107024512.000|CC1|PARTNERSHIP WITH THE PULITZER   
20110107024512.000|20110107024513.000|CC1|CENTER ON CRISIS REPORTING AND  
20110107024513.000|20110107024515.000|CC1|THE UNDERTOLD STORIES PROJECT AT
20110107024515.000|20110107024516.000|CC1|SAINT MARY'S UNIVERSITY IN      
20110107024516.000|20110107024519.000|CC1|MINNESOTA.                      
20110107024519.000|20110107024520.000|CC1|>> Woodruff: FINALLY TONIGHT,   
20110107024520.000|20110107024521.000|CC1|SOME EARLY FINDINGS IN AN       
20110107024521.000|20110107024522.000|CC1|INVESTIGATION OF THE GULF OIL   
20110107024522.000|20110107024523.000|CC1|SPILL.                          
20110107024523.000|20110107024528.000|CC1|RAY SUAREZ HAS THE STORY.       
20110107024528.000|20110107024529.000|CC1|>> Suarez: THIS IMAGE OF THE    
20110107024529.000|20110107024532.000|CC1|"DEEPWATER HORIZON" OIL RIG-- ON
20110107024532.000|20110107024533.000|CC1|FIRE IN THE GULF OF MEXICO-- IS 
20110107024533.000|20110107024535.000|CC1|NOW A MEMORY, BUT THE           
20110107024535.000|20110107024536.000|CC1|PRESIDENT'S COMMISSION WARNS IT 
20110107024536.000|20110107024538.000|CC1|COULD ALL HAPPEN AGAIN.         
20110107024538.000|20110107024544.000|CC1|UNTIL NEXT WEEK, BUT A 48-PAGE  
20110107024544.000|20110107024545.000|CC1|EXCERPT WAS RELEASED PUBLICLY   
20110107024545.000|20110107024545.000|CC1|TODAY.                          
20110107024545.000|20110107024546.000|CC1|THE PANEL CONCLUDED THAT:       
20110107024546.000|20110107024547.000|CC1|"ABSENT SIGNIFICANT REFORM IN   
20110107024547.000|20110107024548.000|CC1|BOTH INDUSTRY PRACTICES AND     
20110107024548.000|20110107024550.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT POLICIES, A DISASTER 
20110107024550.000|20110107024554.000|CC1|MIGHT WELL RECUR."              
20110107024554.000|20110107024556.000|CC1|ALL THREE COMPANIES INVOLVED    
20110107024556.000|20110107024557.000|CC1|WITH THE WELL B.P., TRANSOCEAN  
20110107024557.000|20110107024559.000|CC1|AND HALLIBURTON WERE CITED FOR  
20110107024559.000|20110107024600.000|CC1|CUTTING CORNERS TO SAVE TIME OR 
20110107024600.000|20110107024603.000|CC1|MONEY.                          
20110107024603.000|20110107024604.000|CC1|THE REPORT SAID THOSE CHOICES   
20110107024604.000|20110107024607.000|CC1|LED TO THE FLOODING OF THE GULF 
20110107024607.000|20110107024608.000|CC1|WITH MORE THAN 200 MILLION      
20110107024608.000|20110107024610.000|CC1|GALLONS OF OIL.                 
20110107024610.000|20110107024611.000|CC1|LAST NOVEMBER, THE COMMISSION'S 
20110107024611.000|20110107024613.000|CC1|LEAD INVESTIGATOR HAD TESTIFIED 
20110107024613.000|20110107024614.000|CC1|HE FOUND NO EVIDENCE OF WANTON  
20110107024614.000|20110107024617.000|CC1|WRONGDOING.                     
20110107024617.000|20110107024619.000|CC1|>> WE SEE NO INSTANCE WHERE A   
20110107024619.000|20110107024621.000|CC1|DECISION-MAKING PERSON OR GROUP 
20110107024621.000|20110107024625.000|CC1|OF PEOPLE SAT THERE, AWARE OF   
20110107024625.000|20110107024628.000|CC1|SAFETY RISKS, AWARE OF COSTS,   
20110107024628.000|20110107024629.000|CC1|AND OPTED TO GIVE UP SAFETY FOR 
20110107024629.000|20110107024630.000|CC1|COST.                           
20110107024630.000|20110107024631.000|CC1|>> Suarez: INSTEAD, THE REPORT  
20110107024631.000|20110107024633.000|CC1|SAYS THE PROBLEM WAS MUCH BIGGER
20110107024633.000|20110107024643.000|CC1|THAN ANY INDIVIDUAL, AND THA    
20110107024643.000|20110107024643.000|CC1|ENGINEERING THAT IT SAID        
20110107024643.000|20110107024645.000|CC1|INCREASED THE RISK OF A BLOWOUT,
20110107024645.000|20110107024647.000|CC1|MANY OF THEM REGARDING THE      
20110107024647.000|20110107024648.000|CC1|WELL'S CEMENT JOB, DONE BY      
20110107024648.000|20110107024651.000|CC1|HALLIBURTON.                    
20110107024651.000|20110107024652.000|CC1|BUT THE NEW REPORT ALSO CITES   
20110107024652.000|20110107024653.000|CC1|B.P.'S DECISION TO CUT THE      
20110107024653.000|20110107024655.000|CC1|NUMBER OF CENTRALIZERS USED TO  
20110107024655.000|20110107024656.000|CC1|CENTER THE WELL PIPE DURING THE 
20110107024656.000|20110107024659.000|CC1|CEMENT WORK.                    
20110107024659.000|20110107024700.000|CC1|THE PANEL REFERRED TO THIS EMAIL
20110107024700.000|20110107024702.000|CC1|FROM A B.P. ENGINEER WHO WROTE: 
20110107024702.000|20110107024704.000|CC1|"WHO CARES, IT'S DONE, END OF   
20110107024704.000|20110107024706.000|CC1|STORY, WE WILL PROBABLY BE FINE 
20110107024706.000|20110107024708.000|CC1|AND WE'LL GET A GOOD CEMENT     
20110107024708.000|20110107024710.000|CC1|JOB."                           
20110107024710.000|20110107024713.000|CC1|IN A STATEMENT ISSUED WEDNESDAY,
20110107024713.000|20110107024714.000|CC1|B.P. SAID IT'S WORKING WITH     
20110107024714.000|20110107024715.000|CC1|REGULATORS TO IMPROVE           
20110107024715.000|20110107024716.000|CC1|OPERATIONS.                     
20110107024716.000|20110107024717.000|CC1|BUT HALLIBURTON AND TRANSOCEAN, 
20110107024717.000|20110107024720.000|CC1|THE RIG OWNER, AGAIN FAULTED    
20110107024720.000|20110107024721.000|CC1|B.P. ENGINEERS FOR BAD          
20110107024721.000|20110107024723.000|CC1|DECISIONS.                      
20110107024723.000|20110107024724.000|CC1|QUESTIONS REMAIN ABOUT THE      
20110107024724.000|20110107024726.000|CC1|BLOWOUT PREVENTER, WHICH FAILED 
20110107024726.000|20110107024727.000|CC1|TO STOP OIL FROM SPEWING INTO

20110107024730.000|20110107024734.000|CC1|NOT BE READY UNTIL NEXT MONTH.  
20110107024734.000|20110107024736.000|CC1|FOR MORE ON WHAT WE LEARNED FROM
20110107024736.000|20110107024738.000|CC1|THE COMMISSION'S EARLY EXCERPT, 
20110107024738.000|20110107024739.000|CC1|WE ARE JOINED BY JOEL ACHENBACH 
20110107024739.000|20110107024745.000|CC1|OF THE "WASHINGTON POST."       
20110107024745.000|20110107024745.000|CC1|LOOKING OVER THIS EARLY         
20110107024745.000|20110107024747.000|CC1|RELEASE, WHAT WOULD YOU SAY IS  
20110107024747.000|20110107024748.000|CC1|THE KEY FINDING?                
20110107024748.000|20110107024750.000|CC1|>> I THINK THEY'RE SAYING THIS  
20110107024750.000|20110107024752.000|CC1|WAS NOT REALLY AN ACCIDENT IN   
20110107024752.000|20110107024756.000|CC1|THE CLASSIC SENSE OF A FREAK

20110107024756.000|20110107024759.000|CC1|THEY'RE SAYING THERE WASN'T     
20110107024759.000|20110107024807.000|CC1|JUST ONE BAD ACTOR.             
20110107024807.000|20110107024809.000|CC1|>> THIS TRAGIC INCIDENT         
20110107024809.000|20110107024810.000|CC1|EMERGED FROM A SYSTEM.          
20110107024810.000|20110107024812.000|CC1|IT'S A SYSTEMIC FAILURE.        
20110107024812.000|20110107024814.000|CC1|IF YOU GO BACK TO EARLY MAY,    
20110107024814.000|20110107024816.000|CC1|LATE APRIL, I THINK IT WAS ONE  
20110107024816.000|20110107024818.000|CC1|OF THE SENIOR PEOPLE FOR BP

20110107024827.000|20110107024827.000|CC1|EQUIPMENT.                      
20110107024827.000|20110107024829.000|CC1|BP BLAMED THE BLOWOUT           
20110107024829.000|20110107024830.000|CC1|PREVENTER ON TOP OF THE WELL.

20110107024838.000|20110107024840.000|CC1|COMPANY, WHICH IS MUSIC TO      
20110107024840.000|20110107024843.000|CC1|BP'S EARS.

20110107024847.000|20110107024848.000|CC1|THE INDUSTRY WHICH ALLOWED      
20110107024848.000|20110107024850.000|CC1|THIS EVENT TO HAPPEN.           
20110107024850.000|20110107024851.000|CC1|>> WHAT ARE SOME OF THE

20110107024857.000|20110107024907.000|CC1|WHAT DO THEY SAY WASN'T         
20110107024907.000|20110107024908.000|CC1|GETTING DONE?                   
20110107024908.000|20110107024910.000|CC1|>> WHEN BP HAD TO MAKE A TOUGH  
20110107024910.000|20110107024911.000|CC1|DECISION, IT WENT WITH THE      
20110107024911.000|20110107024921.000|CC1|DECISION THAT EITHER SAVED      
20110107024921.000|20110107024922.000|CC1|TIME, EVERY DAY A MILLION       
20110107024922.000|20110107024924.000|CC1|DOLLARS GOES OUT THE DOOR,      
20110107024924.000|20110107024925.000|CC1|WHETHER IT'S DRILLING OR NOT.   
20110107024925.000|20110107024927.000|CC1|SO THEY MADE DECISIONS TO SAVE  
20110107024927.000|20110107024928.000|CC1|TIME.

20110107024933.000|20110107024935.000|CC1|THEY CHOSE NOT TO DO THAT.

20110107024949.000|20110107024949.000|CC1|MORE.                           
20110107024949.000|20110107024950.000|CC1|THEY DIDN'T DO THAT.            
20110107024950.000|20110107024952.000|CC1|THEY WOULD HAVE TAKEN TIME.     
20110107024952.000|20110107024955.000|CC1|IT WOULD HAVE COST MONEY.       
20110107024955.000|20110107024959.000|CC1|>> THEY TOOK OTHER STEPS THAT   
20110107024959.000|20110107025002.000|CC1|THEY SAID THE COMMISSION        
20110107025002.000|20110107025006.000|CC1|FEELS -- THE PATTERN THEY       
20110107025006.000|20110107025008.000|CC1|POTENTIALLY RISKED THE RAISE    
20110107025008.000|20110107025009.000|CC1|OF A BLOWOUT.                   
20110107025009.000|20110107025011.000|CC1|>> AND WHAT'S A CENTRALIZER?    
20110107025011.000|20110107025014.000|CC1|>> YOU HAVE A PIPE THAT GOES    
20110107025014.000|20110107025016.000|CC1|DOWN IN THE L. IT KEEPS IS      
20110107025016.000|20110107025017.000|CC1|CENTERED IN THE WELL FOR WHEN   
20110107025017.000|20110107025020.000|CC1|YOU DO THE CEMENT JOB.          
20110107025020.000|20110107025022.000|CC1|THE CEMENT WILL COME UP EVENLY  
20110107025022.000|20110107025022.000|CC1|AROUND THE PIPE.                
20110107025022.000|20110107025024.000|CC1|IF YOU DON'T HAVE THE           
20110107025024.000|20110107025025.000|CC1|CENTRALIZER, THE PIPE CAN GO    
20110107025025.000|20110107025028.000|CC1|ONE WAY OR THE OTHER IN THE

20110107025032.000|20110107025034.000|CC1|IMPERFECT CEMENT JOB, AND       
20110107025034.000|20110107025037.000|CC1|CHANNELING WHICH COULD ALLOW    
20110107025037.000|20110107025038.000|CC1|GAS TO FLOW UP THE WELL.        
20110107025038.000|20110107025041.000|CC1|>> AND WHILE THIS IS POPULARLY  
20110107025041.000|20110107025044.000|CC1|THOUGHT OF AS THE BP OIL

20110107025258.000|20110107025307.000|CC1|>> L IT WORKED BEFORE.          
20110107025307.000|20110107025308.000|CC1|THEY GRADUALLY WENT INTO        
20110107025308.000|20110107025309.000|CC1|DEEPER AND DEEPER WATER, AND    
20110107025309.000|20110107025311.000|CC1|AS THEY DID THIS, THEY DIDN'T   
20110107025311.000|20110107025313.000|CC1|STOP FOR A CATASTROPHIC EVENT.  
20110107025313.000|20110107025316.000|CC1|AND YOU KEEP GOING INTO DEEPER  
20110107025316.000|20110107025319.000|CC1|WATER, ANDA THE MACONDO L THEY  
20110107025319.000|20110107025320.000|CC1|WERE DRILLING AT 5,000 FEET.    
20110107025320.000|20110107025323.000|CC1|BUT THE COOLS THEY HAD WERE     
20110107025323.000|20110107025324.000|CC1|THE SAME TOOLS THAT THEY HAD    
20110107025324.000|20110107025328.000|CC1|USED IN THE SHALLOW WATER.      
20110107025328.000|20110107025329.000|CC1|THE TOOLS TO CONTROL THE WELL,  
20110107025329.000|20110107025331.000|CC1|AND THE TOOLS TO TRY TO PLUG    
20110107025331.000|20110107025334.000|CC1|THE WELL AFTER THE BLOWOUT.     
20110107025334.000|20110107025335.000|CC1|AND SOMEWHERE ALONG THE LINE,   
20110107025335.000|20110107025338.000|CC1|I THINK THE INDUSTRY NEEDED TO  
20110107025338.000|20110107025339.000|CC1|REALIZE WE'VE GONE TO A         
20110107025339.000|20110107025340.000|CC1|DIFFERENT PLANET HERE.          
20110107025340.000|20110107025342.000|CC1|THIS IS A DIFFERENT             
20110107025342.000|20110107025343.000|CC1|ENVIRONMENT.                    
20110107025343.000|20110107025345.000|CC1|MAYBE WE NEED A MORE ROBUST     
20110107025345.000|20110107025347.000|CC1|SET OF TRUEMENTS, AND TOOLS     
20110107025347.000|20110107025350.000|CC1|AND HARDWARE AND ROBOTDIC       
20110107025350.000|20110107025352.000|CC1|SUBMERSEIBLES AND JUST NEED A   
20110107025352.000|20110107025353.000|CC1|DIFFERENT SKILL SET IN DEALING  
20110107025353.000|20110107025354.000|CC1|WITH THE DEEP WATERS.
